                 Founder.org applications are accepted until April 30th. Apply here !            2013 Competition finalist, Keen Home Scored One of the Biggest Wins in 'Shark Tank' History.            Don't miss the Final Round of the $200K Entrepreneurs Challenge. Join us May 1. Register to attend here .                In a business world of non-stop change, there's only one way to win the game: Transform it entirely.    Our mission: To develop serial innovators capable of launching and leading organizations that challenge assumed boundaries and inspire a sense of what's possible.        – A Catalyst for New Venture Creation          At the Berkley Center, we provide students with real-world, hands-on startup experiences that complement the rigorous instruction received in the classroom. And we offer alumni, faculty and staff a platform from which they can leverage their professional experience and skills to launch new ventures or accelerate the growth of existing ones.    Each year, more than 800 aspiring entrepreneurs and early-stage CEOs turn to the Berkley Center for information, guidance and startup assistance. Take a moment to explore what NYU Stern and the Berkley Center for Entrepreneurship and Innovation have to offer you, an entrepreneurial leader of tomorrow.                         Popular Links       $200K Entrepreneurs Challenge    New Venture Office Hours & Startup Services    Volunteer    Ideas Never Sleep      Congratulations! $200K Entrepreneurs Challenge   2014-2015 Semi-finalist Teams          Get your idea rolling .   Schedule a meeting with us!    For more information, visit Startup Services .          Contact the Berkley Center   Henry Kaufman Management Center  Suite 8-160  44 West 4th St.  New York, NY 10012  Phone: 212-998-0070                   Upcoming    Come to the NYU $200K Entrepreneurs Challenge  The Final Round  Support NYU's top innovators. Vote for your favorite venture.  Join us to see amazing ideas and exciting innovations on May 1st.   RSVP    Need Cash for Your Venture?  $100K for NYU Startups.  Unique accelerator program provides funding and 1-year of mentoring. Deadline - 5/5/15. Apply here .   Grand Central Tech  Get 1 year of free office space, access to interns, mentors, legal/tax/PR/accounting services, and more. Applications due May 1 - Apply here .      In the Spotlight   Keen Home 2013 New Venture Competition Finalist team secures the funding they were seeking from Robert Herjavec on "Shark Tank". Excerpt taken from Inc.com -- "Keen Home, a former finalist in Inc.'s Coolest College Startups, landed one of the highest valuations in the history of 'Shark Tank'." Join us May 1. Register to attend here .                In a business world of non-stop change, there's only one way to win the game: Transform it entirely.    Our mission: To develop serial innovators capable of launching and leading organizations that challenge assumed boundaries and inspire a sense of what's possible.        – A Catalyst for New Venture Creation          At the Berkley Center, we provide students with real-world, hands-on startup experiences that complement the rigorous instruction received in the classroom. And we offer alumni, faculty and staff a platform from which they can leverage their professional experience and skills to launch new ventures or accelerate the growth of existing ones.    Each year, more than 800 aspiring entrepreneurs and early-stage CEOs turn to the Berkley Center for information, guidance and startup assistance. Take a moment to explore what NYU Stern and the Berkley Center for Entrepreneurship and Innovation have to offer you, an entrepreneurial leader of tomorrow.
